entry.title: Shining a Light on Armenia's POWs in Baku

media:group.media:title: Shining a Light on Armenia's POWs in Baku
media:group.media:description:
This week on Insights, host Eric Hacopian discusses the urgent issue of Armenian prisoners of war still detained in Azerbaijan years after the November 9 ceasefire agreement. He also shared key statements from Artsakh's last president. Tune in for the latest information and perspectives on these critical topics.

entry.title: Armenia welcomes possible EU visa liberalization

media:group.media:title: Armenia welcomes possible EU visa liberalization
media:group.media:description:
üìç‚ÄúWe don‚Äôt get answers by participating anyway.‚Äù Armenia‚Äôs security chief commented on Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan‚Äôs decision not to attend an upcoming Russian military alliance summit. üìçArmenia welcomed a recommendation by top European Union diplomats to loosen visa requirements for Armenian passport holders. üìçThe United States expects Azerbaijan to guarantee the right of Nagorno-Karabakh‚Äôs Armenians to return to their homes, according to a State Department spokesperson. üìçThe International Committee of the Red Cross visited Armenians held in Azerbaijan.
